name: teleport
effect: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
short_effect: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A psychic move for fleeing from battle instantly.
flavor_text.emerald: A psychic move for fleeing from battle instantly.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: Use it to flee from any wild POKéMON. Also warps to the last POKé CENTER.
